text: @realDonaldTrump Mail in ballots have been used for some time. Even you mailed in your ballot. Why all the sudden they are a problem? Perhaps if you came up with a comprehensive plan to combat COVID19 people can go to the polls. You see a problem come with with a solution. Stop whining.

domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
